name: The Pigeon Mafia
description: The Pigeon Mafia,  You play as a games designer in a boring world, were his best friend is a dog called Bruno. But one day you encounter a pigeon which defecates all over your head after an encounter with your dog. So you both set out on a mission to get revenge. You succeed but in doing so you become the most wanted on the pigeon mafia’s hit list. You now have to Argue, Fight and run for your life. Every decision counts. You will engage in shootouts and have dangerous opportunities to take a quick way out of the situation but it always comes with a risk…
